Bar.description: Bar represents an OHLCV candlestick bar.

CryptoBar.description: CryptoBar represents a crypto OHLCV bar.

CryptoBarsList.description: CryptoBarsList is a list of bars for a single symbol.

CryptoQuote.description: CryptoQuote represents a crypto bid/ask quote.

CryptoQuotesList.description: CryptoQuotesList is a list of quotes for a single symbol.

CryptoSnapshot.description: CryptoSnapshot represents a point-in-time crypto market data snapshot.

CryptoTradesList.description: CryptoTradesList is a list of trades for a single symbol.

DailyAuctions.description: DailyAuctions represents opening and closing auctions for a day.

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GetCryptoBarsRequest.description: GetCryptoBarsRequest is the request to get historical crypto bars.

limit.description: Maximum number of bars to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetCryptoBarsResponse.description: GetCryptoBarsResponse is the response containing crypto bars.

GetCryptoQuotesRequest.description: GetCryptoQuotesRequest is the request to get historical crypto quotes.

limit.description: Maximum number of quotes to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetCryptoQuotesResponse.description: GetCryptoQuotesResponse is the response containing crypto quotes.

GetCryptoSnapshotsRequest.description: GetCryptoSnapshotsRequest is the request to get crypto snapshots.

GetCryptoSnapshotsResponse.description: GetCryptoSnapshotsResponse is the response containing crypto snapshots.

GetCryptoTradesRequest.description: GetCryptoTradesRequest is the request to get historical crypto trades.

limit.description: Maximum number of trades to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetCryptoTradesResponse.description: GetCryptoTradesResponse is the response containing crypto trades.

GetLatestCryptoBarsRequest.description: GetLatestCryptoBarsRequest is the request to get the latest crypto bars.

GetLatestCryptoBarsResponse.description: GetLatestCryptoBarsResponse is the response containing the latest crypto bars.

bars.description: Map of symbol to latest bar.

GetLatestCryptoQuotesRequest.description: GetLatestCryptoQuotesRequest is the request to get the latest crypto quotes.

GetLatestCryptoQuotesResponse.description: GetLatestCryptoQuotesResponse is the response containing the latest crypto quotes.

quotes.description: Map of symbol to latest quote.

GetLatestCryptoTradesRequest.description: GetLatestCryptoTradesRequest is the request to get the latest crypto trades.

GetLatestCryptoTradesResponse.description: GetLatestCryptoTradesResponse is the response containing the latest crypto trades.

trades.description: Map of symbol to latest trade.

GetLatestOptionBarsRequest.description: GetLatestOptionBarsRequest is the request to get the latest option bars.

GetLatestOptionBarsResponse.description: GetLatestOptionBarsResponse is the response containing the latest option bars.

bars.description: Map of symbol to latest bar.

GetLatestOptionQuotesRequest.description: GetLatestOptionQuotesRequest is the request to get the latest option quotes.

GetLatestOptionQuotesResponse.description: GetLatestOptionQuotesResponse is the response containing the latest option quotes.

quotes.description: Map of symbol to latest quote.

GetLatestOptionTradesRequest.description: GetLatestOptionTradesRequest is the request to get the latest option trades.

GetLatestOptionTradesResponse.description: GetLatestOptionTradesResponse is the response containing the latest option trades.

trades.description: Map of symbol to latest trade.

GetLatestStockBarsRequest.description: GetLatestStockBarsRequest is the request to get the latest stock bars.

GetLatestStockBarsResponse.description: GetLatestStockBarsResponse is the response containing the latest stock bars.

bars.description: Map of symbol to latest bar.

GetLatestStockQuotesRequest.description: GetLatestStockQuotesRequest is the request to get the latest stock quotes.

GetLatestStockQuotesResponse.description: GetLatestStockQuotesResponse is the response containing the latest stock quotes.

quotes.description: Map of symbol to latest quote.

GetLatestStockTradesRequest.description: GetLatestStockTradesRequest is the request to get the latest stock trades.

GetLatestStockTradesResponse.description: GetLatestStockTradesResponse is the response containing the latest stock trades.

trades.description: Map of symbol to latest trade.

GetMostActivesRequest.description: GetMostActivesRequest is the request to get most active stocks.

top.description: Number of results to return (default 10, max 100).

GetMostActivesResponse.description: GetMostActivesResponse is the response containing most active stocks.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when this data was last updated (RFC 3339).

GetMoversRequest.description: GetMoversRequest is the request to get top movers.

top.description: Number of results to return (default 10, max 50).

GetMoversResponse.description: GetMoversResponse is the response containing top movers.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when this data was last updated (RFC 3339).

GetNewsRequest.description: GetNewsRequest is the request to get news articles.

limit.description: Maximum number of articles to return (1-50, default 10).

symbols.description: Comma-separated list of symbols to filter by.

GetNewsResponse.description: GetNewsResponse is the response containing news articles.

GetOptionBarsRequest.description: GetOptionBarsRequest is the request to get historical option bars.

limit.description: Maximum number of bars to return (1-10000, default 1000).

symbols.description: Comma-separated list of option symbols (OCC format).

GetOptionBarsResponse.description: GetOptionBarsResponse is the response containing option bars.

GetOptionChainRequest.description: GetOptionChainRequest is the request to get an option chain for an underlying.

expirationDateGte.description: Filter by expiration date greater than or equal to (YYYY-MM-DD).

expirationDateLte.description: Filter by expiration date less than or equal to (YYYY-MM-DD).

strikePriceGte.description: Filter by strike price greater than or equal to.

strikePriceLte.description: Filter by strike price less than or equal to.

GetOptionChainResponse.description: GetOptionChainResponse is the response containing an option chain.

snapshots.description: Map of option symbol to snapshot.

GetOptionQuotesRequest.description: GetOptionQuotesRequest is the request to get historical option quotes.

limit.description: Maximum number of quotes to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetOptionQuotesResponse.description: GetOptionQuotesResponse is the response containing option quotes.

GetOptionSnapshotsRequest.description: GetOptionSnapshotsRequest is the request to get option snapshots.

GetOptionSnapshotsResponse.description: GetOptionSnapshotsResponse is the response containing option snapshots.

GetOptionTradesRequest.description: GetOptionTradesRequest is the request to get historical option trades.

limit.description: Maximum number of trades to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetOptionTradesResponse.description: GetOptionTradesResponse is the response containing option trades.

GetStockAuctionsRequest.description: GetStockAuctionsRequest is the request to get stock auctions.

GetStockAuctionsResponse.description: GetStockAuctionsResponse is the response containing stock auctions.

GetStockBarsRequest.description: GetStockBarsRequest is the request to get historical stock bars.

limit.description: Maximum number of bars to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetStockBarsResponse.description: GetStockBarsResponse is the response containing stock bars.

GetStockQuotesRequest.description: GetStockQuotesRequest is the request to get historical stock quotes.

limit.description: Maximum number of quotes to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetStockQuotesResponse.description: GetStockQuotesResponse is the response containing stock quotes.

GetStockSnapshotRequest.description: GetStockSnapshotRequest is the request to get a single stock snapshot.

GetStockSnapshotsRequest.description: GetStockSnapshotsRequest is the request to get stock snapshots.

GetStockSnapshotsResponse.description: GetStockSnapshotsResponse is the response containing stock snapshots.

GetStockTradesRequest.description: GetStockTradesRequest is the request to get historical stock trades.

limit.description: Maximum number of trades to return (1-10000, default 1000).

GetStockTradesResponse.description: GetStockTradesResponse is the response containing stock trades.

MostActive.description: MostActive represents a most active stock.

Mover.description: Mover represents a top mover stock.

content.description: Full article content (if include_content is true).

summary.example: Apple Inc. announced record-breaking earnings for the fourth quarter...
examples: Apple Inc. announced record-breaking earnings for the fourth quarter...

NewsImage.description: NewsImage represents an image associated with a news article.

OptionBar.description: OptionBar represents an option OHLCV bar.

OptionBarsList.description: OptionBarsList is a list of bars for a single option symbol.

OptionQuote.description: OptionQuote represents an option bid/ask quote.

OptionQuotesList.description: OptionQuotesList is a list of quotes for a single option symbol.

OptionSnapshot.description: OptionSnapshot represents a point-in-time option market data snapshot.

OptionTradesList.description: OptionTradesList is a list of trades for a single option symbol.

Snapshot.description: Snapshot represents a point-in-time market data snapshot.

StockAuctionsList.description: StockAuctionsList is a list of daily auctions for a single symbol.

StockBarsList.description: StockBarsList is a list of bars for a single symbol.

StockQuotesList.description: StockQuotesList is a list of quotes for a single symbol.

StockTradesList.description: StockTradesList is a list of trades for a single symbol.

Trade.description: Trade represents a single trade execution.

z.description: Tape (A = NYSE, B = ARCA, C = NASDAQ).

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

get.description:
GetNews retrieves news articles.
 GET /v1beta1/news

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of symbols to filter by.
parameters.name: symbols

parameters.description: Maximum number of articles to return (1-50, default 10).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetOptionBars retrieves historical option bars.
 GET /v1beta1/options/bars

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of option symbols (OCC format).
parameters.name: symbols

parameters.description: Maximum number of bars to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestOptionBars retrieves the latest option bars.
 GET /v1beta1/options/bars/latest

GetOptionQuotes retrieves historical option quotes.
 GET /v1beta1/options/quotes

parameters.description: Maximum number of quotes to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestOptionQuotes retrieves the latest option quotes.
 GET /v1beta1/options/quotes/latest

GetOptionSnapshots retrieves option snapshots.
 GET /v1beta1/options/snapshots

GetOptionChain retrieves the option chain for an underlying.
 GET /v1beta1/options/snapshots/{underlying_symbol}

parameters.description: Filter by strike price greater than or equal to.
parameters.name: strike_price_gte

parameters.description: Filter by strike price less than or equal to.
parameters.name: strike_price_lte

parameters.description: Filter by expiration date greater than or equal to (YYYY-MM-DD).
parameters.name: expiration_date_gte

parameters.description: Filter by expiration date less than or equal to (YYYY-MM-DD).
parameters.name: expiration_date_lte

get.description:
GetOptionTrades retrieves historical option trades.
 GET /v1beta1/options/trades

parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestOptionTrades retrieves the latest option trades.
 GET /v1beta1/options/trades/latest

GetMostActives retrieves the most active stocks.
 GET /v1beta1/screener/stocks/most-actives

parameters.description: Number of results to return (default 10, max 100).
parameters.name: top

get.description:
GetMovers retrieves the top market movers.
 GET /v1beta1/screener/{market_type}/movers

parameters.description: Number of results to return (default 10, max 50).
parameters.name: top

get.description:
GetCryptoBars retrieves historical crypto bars.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/bars

parameters.description: Maximum number of bars to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestCryptoBars retrieves the latest crypto bars.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/latest/bars

GetLatestCryptoQuotes retrieves the latest crypto quotes.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/latest/quotes

GetLatestCryptoTrades retrieves the latest crypto trades.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/latest/trades

GetCryptoQuotes retrieves historical crypto quotes.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/quotes

parameters.description: Maximum number of quotes to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetCryptoSnapshots retrieves crypto snapshots.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/snapshots

GetCryptoTrades retrieves historical crypto trades.
 GET /v1beta3/crypto/{loc}/trades

parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetStockAuctions retrieves stock auction data.
 GET /v2/stocks/auctions

GetStockBars retrieves historical stock bars.
 GET /v2/stocks/bars

parameters.description: Maximum number of bars to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestStockBars retrieves the latest stock bars.
 GET /v2/stocks/bars/latest

GetStockQuotes retrieves historical stock quotes.
 GET /v2/stocks/quotes

parameters.description: Maximum number of quotes to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestStockQuotes retrieves the latest stock quotes.
 GET /v2/stocks/quotes/latest

GetStockSnapshots retrieves stock snapshots for multiple symbols.
 GET /v2/stocks/snapshots

GetStockTrades retrieves historical stock trades.
 GET /v2/stocks/trades

parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return (1-10000, default 1000).
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
GetLatestStockTrades retrieves the latest stock trades.
 GET /v2/stocks/trades/latest

GetStockSnapshot retrieves a single stock snapshot.
 GET /v2/stocks/{symbol}/snapshot
